rukus.text: Have you (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) not seen how your Lord dealt with the Owners of the Elephant? [The elephant army which came from Yemen under the command of Abrahah Al-Ashram intending to destroy the Ka'bah at Makkah]
Did He not make their plot go astray
And sent against them birds, in flocks
Striking them with stones of Sijjil
And made them like an empty field of stalks (of which the corn has been eaten up by cattle)
